metadata.name: Rojo Amor
metadata.description:
MASCARADA ¨Because the mask stands between the self and the world, it has a dual nature: looking both in and out. It can disguise, cover, veil, lie, capture, emit, reveal, project, protect, deny, remember, deceive, dissociate, embody and transform.¨
(...) it was therefore both the spirit that transforms and the one that needed to be liberated and transformed.
